title: Peace Mom: A Mother's Journey through Heartache to Activism
description: The determined mother of Casey Sheehan, an army specialist who was killed in action during his service in Iraq, describes the epiphany that led her to dedicate her life to promoting global peace, her decision to become an anti-war activist after meeting with President Bush, and the impact of her Crawford, Texas, vigil at the president's ranch. 75,000 first printing.
author: Cindy Sheehan
